item.description:
They just kept walking in the door! Even got one that was just buying a pizza named Brad :) So! come on down and join us for good friends, good food and G*R*E*A*T* cribbage :)

Good group, fun game play, relaxed environment. I've already pencilled in the next one, so spoke newbie Josh!

The Cribbage Gods rewarded me with a win in a three-player game in which Micki only made it to 90. But then I lost 121-120 to a newbie, so spoke Gabe!

For once, I could be the skunker, and against Emad even, quoted Dave H excitedly!

Joe, Bette and Ellen (welcome back) played reverse cribbage and laughed the whole time away!!! And laughed so much that Joe left early.

Debbie was the newbie that beat Karen (I think skunk), beat Gabe, and then I think pummeled someone else at the end! And said: even with the Yodeling Pickle she would RETURN!!!

AND don’t forget about the Yodeling Pickle – come on down to find out all about this new musical! A regift from Gabe!

AND, the Red Cribbage Bag will be with the Café Angelina’s employees and please give it back to them so I can pick it up from them when I return from my vacation to the Caribbean, thanks :)

They just kept walking in the door! Even got one that was just buying a pizza named Brad :) So! come on down and join us for good friends, good food and G*R*E*A*T* cribbage :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet-Up: Relax In Between Your Shopping For Some F*U*N!
